title: Black bean chilli
ingredients: ['500 g (1 lb 2 oz) black beans', '1 bay leaf', '2 tablespoons cumin seeds', '2 tablespoons dried oregano', '½ teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1-2 tablespoons chilli powder', '1 tablespoon paprika', '2 tablespoons sunflower oil', '350 g (12 oz) onions, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, chopped', '400 g (14 oz) canned chopped tomatoes', '½ teaspoon Hickory Liquid Barbeque Smoke Marinade, optional', 'Salt', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', 'To garnish: chopped fresh coriander']
